client_profile_higher_education_0_univer: WHU – Otto Beisheim School of Management
client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first encountered Lina Lilli Schmidt on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Lina Lilli Schmidt is a 22 year old and comes from Germany.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Lina Lilli Schmidt is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Lina completed her secondary education at Max-Planck-Gymnasium München in 2020.
Lina received her degree from WHU – Otto Beisheim School of Management in 2025.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Lina Lilli Schmidt is a 22 year old and comes from Germany.
Lina Lilli Schmidt did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not save any money from her earnings.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of her grandfather, a successful Real Estate Developer, she received an inheritance of 2770000 EUR in 2018, which she has used to secure her financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Lina achieve financial success and security as she embarks on her professional journey.
